Side 1 Game Text: SUN:  Atum deals the Hero Character with the highest HP (H) fire damage.
Side 2 Game Text: HAND:  Destroy 1 Item card. END PHASE If The Sickle of Geb is in play, remove it from the game, then destroy all Environment cards.

Side 1 Game Text: HAND:  Geb deals each non-Villain target 2 melee damage.
Side 2 Game Text: HAND:  Destroy 1 Ongoing card. END PHASE If The Khopesh of Shu is in play, remove it from the game, then destroy (H) Hero Ongoing and/or Item cards.

Side 1 Game Text: ANKH:  Isis deals the (H) minus 2 Hero targets with the highest HP 1 radiant and 2 infernal damage each.
Side 2 Game Text: HAND:  The (H) non-Villain targets with the highest HP each deal themselves 1 fixed psychic damage. END PHASE If The Crook and Flail of Osiris is in play, remove it from the game, then flip this card to its active side, restoring it to 9 HP.

Side 1 Game Text: ANKH:  The (H) minus 1 non-Villain targets with the lowest HP deal themselves 1 fixed psychic damage each. The (H) minus 1 Villain characters with the lowest HP regain 2 HP each.
Side 2 Game Text: ANKH:  Discard the top 2 cards of each Hero deck. END PHASE If The Sun Disc of Isis is in play, remove it from the game, then each Hero target deals itself 2 fixed radiant damage.

Side 1 Game Text: SUN:  The Villain character with the lowest HP regains (H) HP.
Side 2 Game Text: ANKH:  Play the top card of the Environment deck. END PHASE If The Typhonic Rod of Set is in play, remove it from the game, then play the top card of the Environment deck, then play the top card of the Villain deck.

Side 1 Game Text: HAND:  Osiris deals the (H) minus 1 non-Villain targets with the lowest HP 1 infernal damage each.
Side 2 Game Text: SUN:  1 Hero buries 1 card from their hand. END PHASE If The Shield of Tefnut is in play, remove it from the game, then each Hero discards 2 cards.

Side 1 Game Text: ANKH:  Set deals the (H) non-Villain targets with the highest HP 1 lightning damage and 1 cold damage each.
Side 2 Game Text: ANKH:  The (H) Villain characters with the lowest HP each regain 1 HP. END PHASE If the Ankh of Nephthys is in play, remove it from the game, then flip 1 incapacitated Villain character card other than this one to its active side and restore it to 9 HP.

Side 1 Game Text: HAND:  Shu deals the Hero character with the lowest HP (H) minus 2 melee damage.
Side 2 Game Text: SUN:  Each Environment target regains 2 HP. END PHASE If The Orb of Nuit is in play, remove it from the game, then each Villain character regains (H) HP.

Side 1 Game Text: SUN:  Tefnut deals the Hero target with the second highest HP (H) minus 1 melee damage.
Side 2 Game Text: SUN:  Destroy 1 non-Villain target with 1 HP. END PHASE If The Bracer of Atum is in play, remove it from the game, then each Hero target deals themselves 2 fixed fire damage.
